subject: Fwd: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we accepted your loan request
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you THIS NIGHT (hurry, this tender will expire THIS NIGHT):
$286,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply finish this elementary form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit history will not disqualify you!
http://storeasupsmore.com/
